          <title>
            <string language="en">Potential dividers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mögliche Teiler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diviseurs potentiels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Divisores potenciais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Divisori potenziali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πιθανοί διαιρέτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Divisores potenciales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These potential divider circuit diagrams demonstrate how the output voltage may be measured across a variable resistor (left) or a thermistor (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">variable resistors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagrams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">output voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential dividers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermistors</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese möglichen Teilerschaltpläne zeigen, wie 
die Ausgabespannung über einem variablen Widerstand (nach links) oder
einem Thermistor gemessen werden kann (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces schémas de circuit potentiels de diviseur 
démontrent comment la tension de sortie peut être mesurée à 
travers une résistance variable (à gauche) ou une thermistance 
(droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas de circuito potenciais do divisor
demonstram como a tensão da saída pode ser medida através de um 
resistor variável (à esquerda) ou de um termistor (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi circuitali potenziali del divisore 
dimostrano come la tensione dell'uscita può essere misurata 
attraverso un resistore variabile (a sinistra) o un termistore (di 
destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα πιθανά διαγράμματα κυκλωμάτων διαιρετών 
καταδεικνύουν πώς η τάση εξόδου μπορεί να μετρηθεί πέρα από 
έναν μεταβλητό αντιστάτη (αριστερά) ή μια θερμική αντίσταση 
(δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos esquemas circulares potenciales del divisor
demuestran cómo el voltaje de la salida se puede medir a través de 
un resistor variable (a la izquierda) o de un termistor (derecho).</string>
          </description>
